message: Bob, I'm pleased to offer you this exceptional product.  It's something that I know will be a valuable asset to your business. My asking price is $1,200,000. I'm confident this is a fair price given the value it brings. Let me know your thoughts.

I appreciate your time and consideration, Alice. I'm very interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $800,000. I believe this is a fair price considering the value I've done my research on similar products.

Bob, I understand your position, but $800,000 is unfortunately too low for me.  I'm willing to come down a bit, but I need to ensure I get a fair return on this unique product.  How about $950,000?  This price still allows you to gain significant value, while ensuring I can continue to operate my business.  What do you think?

I appreciate your flexibility, Alice, but $950,000 is still a bit above my budget. I'm willing to meet you halfway at $900,000. I believe this price is reasonable considering the value I'll be getting from the product.
